<!-- Privacy setting link -->
<script>
function addPrivacyLink() {
  var link = document.createElement('a');
  link.href = '#';
  link.className = 'footer__navLink';
  
  // Set text based on domain
  if (window.location.hostname === 'fr.dashthis.com') {
    link.textContent = 'Paramètres de cookies';
  } else {
    link.textContent = 'Cookies settings';
  }
  
  link.onclick = function(e) {
    e.preventDefault();
    UC_UI.showSecondLayer();
  };
  
  var targetElement = document.querySelector("body > div.bodyContainer > footer > div > nav > ul:nth-child(4)");
  var weglotContainer = document.querySelector(".weglot-container");
  
  if (targetElement && weglotContainer) {
    targetElement.insertBefore(link, weglotContainer);
  } else if (targetElement) {
    targetElement.appendChild(link);
  } else {
    console.error("Target element for privacy link not found");
  }
}

window.addEventListener('load', addPrivacyLink);
</script>
<!-- End Privacy setting link -->

        </span>
        <meta itemprop="position" content="3" />
    </li>

    <h1 class="post__title title title--dark title--large">
        8 marketing analytics platforms to simplify your data analysis processes
    </h1>
    <div class="blogArticle__imgWrapper">
        <img alt="Marketing analytics platform" class="blogArticle__img" loading="lazy" src="https://static.dashthis.com/media/2277/blog_automation.svg" />
    </div>
</section>

<section class="tilt tilt--lwhite tilt--rwhite post theme--yellow">
    <div class="post__wrapper post__wrapper--isAside">
        <div class="post__article" id="js-postArticle">




<div class="blogRte">
    <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">How many tools do you use in your marketing technology stack? </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><a rel="noopener" href="https://resources.netskope.com/cloud-reports/netskope-cloud-report-august-2019" target="_blank">Netskope’s 2019 Cloud Report</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> puts this figure at 120 for the average enterprise, a number that keeps rising year on year. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">With more martech tools sprouting up over time (</span>there are<a rel="noopener" href="https://chiefmartec.com/2021/03/many-european-based-martech-products-today-3647-globally-2016/" target="_blank"> now as many European-based martech products in 2021 as there were globally</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> five years ago in 2016), you’ll need more time to aggregate and manage data from all these different platforms. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">More tools mean a higher risk of data fragmentation and siloed data. Imagine the hours you spend each week logging in to each platform, exporting data, uploading it to Microsoft Excel, normalizing and formatting the data, and analyzing your marketing campaigns. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><em><strong>Doesn’t it sound exhausting? </strong></em></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">As you review your marketing technology stack, consider investing in a tool that automates data collection and aggregation across various platforms. We’ve compiled a list of ten marketing analytics platforms to help you see your </span><a rel="noopener" href="/blog/campaign-performance/" target="_blank">campaign performance</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> across multiple marketing channels in one place.</span></p>
<p> </p>
<h2 class="blogRte__subtitle">What are marketing analytics platforms?</h2>
<p> </p>
<p><img src="/media/4520/image1.png" alt="" loading="lazy" data-udi="umb://media/d0567c43df6d45bfaa78b3e85c198263" /></p>
<p><strong><em>A <a rel="noopener" href="/app/view/dashboard-JWfvh1A5KUyOwTBVpT5TYQ" target="_blank">sample report</a> from a marketing analytics platform like DashThis. <a rel="noopener" href="/app/admin/Security/Register" target="_blank">Try it with your data! </a></em></strong></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Ultimately, we use data to make decisions for our marketing strategy. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">You want data gathering to be as effortless as possible to focus your time on analysis - a higher value activity that helps you and your internal stakeholders make business decisions. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Here’s where marketing analytics platforms come in.</span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Marketing analytics platforms help marketing teams aggregate data across multiple marketing tools into one view to understand how their marketing initiatives are performing. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">These tools cut short the laborious process of manually logging in, exporting, and uploading data in static spreadsheets. Teams can view and extract the data across multiple customer journey dimensions and periods in real-time to aid analysis.</span></p>
<p> </p>
<p>From marketing analytics data, you should be able to answer three questions: </p>
<p> </p>
<ul>
<li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Which marketing initiatives should we focus on?</span></li>
<li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Which marketing initiatives aren’t working and we should do less of</span></li>
<li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style="font-weight: 400;">What should we be working on or adjust our approach?</span></li>
</ul>
<p> </p>
<h2 class="blogRte__subtitle">Top 10 marketing analytics software for marketers to automate their reporting</h2>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">We’ll identify some core features and strengths for each <a href="/google-analytics-report-template/">analytics solution</a> listed here and how it integrates with your existing martech stack. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Ready? Let’s dive in! </span></p>
<p> </p>
<h3 class="blogRte__subtitle--small">1. DashThis </h3>
<p> </p>
<p><img src="/media/4530/image3.png" alt="" loading="lazy" data-udi="umb://media/6f12e0a8dac244aaa2f49db8ff4f62c2" /></p>
<p><em><strong><a rel="noopener" href="/" target="_blank">DashThis</a></strong></em> <span style="font-weight: 400;"><br /><br /></span></p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">We are kicking off this list with our self-service marketing analytics tool, </span><a rel="noopener" href="/" target="_blank">DashThis</a><span style="font-weight: 400;">! Customize your dashboards with our white-labeled dashboards. Combine all your </span><a rel="noopener" href="/kpi-examples/" target="_blank">marketing metrics</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> in one dashboard for easy data analysis and segmentation. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">We’re also beginner-friendly with our library of templates allowing you to get up and running efficiently. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Pricing:</strong> <a rel="noopener" href="/pricing/" target="_blank">Starts from</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> US$33/month, with a 15-day free trial included</span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Who would find DashThis helpful:</strong><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Marketing agencies, individual contributors, marketing teams for small businesses </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Integrations:</strong> <span style="font-weight: 400;"> 34+ </span><a rel="noopener" href="/integrations/" target="_blank">integrations</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> across popular digital marketing tools with our API</span></p>
<p> </p>
<h3 class="blogRte__subtitle--small">2. Google Analytics </h3>
<p> </p>
<p><img src="/media/4529/image2.png" alt="" loading="lazy" data-udi="umb://media/6461b4b72116451cb88fcbe2ea6f8242" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><em><strong><a href="https://analytics.google.com/analytics/web/">Google Analytics</a> </strong></em></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Considered the entry point for marketing analytics for millions of websites, Google Analytics is a self-service business intelligence platform owned by one of the most recognizable names in tech. It also comes with its own data </span><a rel="noopener" href="/blog/data-visualization-dashboard-examples/" target="_blank">visualization</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> features in </span><a rel="noopener" href="https://datastudio.google.com/u/0/" target="_blank">Google Data Studio.</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">The best part is that they offer all these features for free, allowing anyone to analyze their marketing data and website visitors regardless of budget.</span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Pricing:</strong><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Free </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Who would find Google Analytics helpful:</strong><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Anyone who needs in-depth traffic or audience insights on their website, including internal search data, traffic sources, audience demographic data, and more. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Integrations:</strong> <span style="font-weight: 400;"> Easily install </span><a rel="noopener" href="https://developers.google.com/analytics" target="_blank">Google Analytics</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> on any website or landing page. It also integrates with countless marketing and sales analytics tools, helping marketing professionals understand and take action on their Google Analytics data </span></p>
<p> </p>
<h3 class="blogRte__subtitle--small">3. SEMRush </h3>
<p> </p>
<p><img src="/media/4525/image5.png" alt="" loading="lazy" data-udi="umb://media/b517466b71f448dc9d0d69b0d2063515" /></p>
<p><em><strong><a href="https://www.semrush.com/">SEMRush</a></strong></em></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">SEMRush specializes in keyword research, search engine optimization (SEO) tools, content marketing, and backlink analysis. Its analytics tools are handy to improve your organic search rankings and inform your content marketing strategies. Marketers also use SEMRush to improve the click-through rate of their pay-per-click (PPC) ads and streamline </span><a rel="noopener" href="/social-media-dashboard/" target="_blank">social media</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> campaign performance. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Pricing:</strong> <a rel="noopener" href="https://www.semrush.com/prices/" target="_blank">Starts</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> from US$99.95/month with a 30-day free trial available </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Who would find SEMRush useful:</strong><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Content marketing and SEO professionals </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Integrations:</strong> <span style="font-weight: 400;"> </span><a rel="noopener" href="https://www.semrush.com/kb/931-integrations" target="_blank">Integrates</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> with Google products like Google A</span><span style="font-weight: 400;">nalytics, Google Ads, Google Search Console, major social media accounts, and tools like WordPress, Zapier, or Trello. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<h3 class="blogRte__subtitle--small">4. HubSpot Marketing Hub </h3>
<p> </p>
<p><img src="/media/4528/image4.png" alt="" loading="lazy" data-udi="umb://media/b9c2bf890faf446fa32355cedf5209b6" /></p>
<p><em><strong><a rel="noopener" href="https://www.hubspot.com/products/marketing" target="_blank">HubSpot Marketing Hub</a></strong></em></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">HubSpot put the term inbound marketing on the map in 2005 and has since expanded its customer relationship management (CRM) solution to support marketing, sales, and customer support, teams. HubSpot’s marketing hub includes a variety of marketing tools in one software. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Their reporting tools are user-friendly, with integrated sales and marketing data powering dashboards and custom reports for easy reporting. One key strength of HubSpot is its deep integration with in-house sales and support tools; allowing teams to work cross-functionality across a single software platform. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">It also includes comprehensive web analytics tools enabling you to collect and report on website analytics and customer data. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Pricing:</strong> <a rel="noopener" href="https://www.hubspot.com/pricing/marketing?products=marketing-hub-starter_1&term=annual" target="_blank" data-anchor="?products=marketing-hub-starter_1&term=annual">Pricing plans</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> dependent on tier and number of marketing contacts </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Who would find HubSpot helpful:</strong><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Internal sales and marketing teams, owners of small-to-medium-sized businesses who need an all-in-one solution covering multiple functions. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Integrations:</strong> <span style="font-weight: 400;">HubSpot’s </span><a rel="noopener" href="https://ecosystem.hubspot.com/marketplace/apps" target="_blank">app marketplace</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> features integrations across multiple categories and business functions. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p> </p>
<h3 class="blogRte__subtitle--small">5. Tableau </h3>
<p> </p>
<p><img src="/media/4527/image9.png" alt="" loading="lazy" data-udi="umb://media/5389f7bc31a14c2fbba494273839cd44" /></p>
<p><em><strong><a href="https://www.tableau.com/">Tableau</a></strong></em></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">A household name in big data analytics and self-service BI tools, Salesforce-owned Tableau caters to organizations that need robust BI capabilities in their workflows. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Tableau goes well beyond analyzing marketing activities. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">It connects with multiple data source categories, including file systems, cloud-based systems, and relational database systems. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Pricing:</strong><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Multiple </span><a rel="noopener" href="https://buy.tableau.com/en-us/" target="_blank">pricing tiers</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> are available depending on the number of users per month</span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Who would find Tableau helpful:</strong> <span style="font-weight: 400;">Enterprise-level companies needing big data analytics</span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Integrations:</strong> <span style="font-weight: 400;"> Many native connectors are </span><a rel="noopener" href="https://www.tableau.com/products/our-integrations" target="_blank">available</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> for multiple databases and file types. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<h3 class="blogRte__subtitle--small">6. Maropost </h3>
<p> </p>
<p><img src="/media/4526/image8.png" alt="" loading="lazy" data-udi="umb://media/46807c7b3ef64893ad6a7912ddf1706f" /></p>
<p><em><strong><a rel="noopener" href="https://www.maropost.com/" target="_blank">Maropost</a></strong></em></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Maropost is an <a href="/blog/omnichannel-metrics/">omnichannel</a> marketing automation platform helping marketers manage their email marketing, mobile optimization, social media marketing, and </span><a rel="noopener" href="/blog/digital-marketing-kpis-and-metrics-ultimate-guide/" target="_blank">digital marketing</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> performance from one platform. They also have a separate Commerce Cloud platform for multi-channel e-commerce stores. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Pricing:</strong><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Marketing Cloud </span><a rel="noopener" href="https://www.maropost.com/platform/plans/" target="_blank">pricing</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> starts from US$279/month, Commerce Cloud separate add-on pricing</span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Who would find Maropost helpful:</strong><span style="font-weight: 400;"> E-commerce businesses, marketers who need a robust marketing automation platform, and customer experience professionals.</span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Integrations:</strong> <span style="font-weight: 400;">Full list of integrations </span><a rel="noopener" href="https://maropost.partnerpage.io/integrations" target="_blank">here</a><span style="font-weight: 400;">.</span></p>
<p> </p>
<h3 class="blogRte__subtitle--small">7. CleverTap </h3>
<p> </p>
<p><img src="/media/4522/image11.png" alt="" loading="lazy" data-udi="umb://media/2382ef8de31b49a4bdc4cae5d8485dcd" /></p>
<p><strong><em><a href="https://clevertap.com/">CleverTap</a></em></strong></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">CleverTap specializes in customer engagement and analytics for mobile devices and mobile apps. CleverTap covers brand engagement, app analytics, and marketing through push notifications, SMS, WhatsApp, and more, best suited for marketers who prioritize mobile engagement KPIs. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Pricing:</strong> <a href="https://clevertap.com/pricing/">Pricing</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> available on request</span><span style="font-weight: 400;"><br /></span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Who would find CleverTap useful:</strong> <span style="font-weight: 400;">Marketers focusing on mobile engagement </span></p>
<p> </p>
<h3 class="blogRte__subtitle--small">8. Mixpanel </h3>
<p> </p>
<p><img src="/media/4523/image10.png" alt="" loading="lazy" data-udi="umb://media/d909e3002b41441ca918d15e12106f9c" /></p>
<p><em><strong><a rel="noopener" href="https://mixpanel.com/" target="_blank">Mixpanel</a></strong></em></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Mixpanel’s self-serve analytics platform focuses on SaaS products, allowing product managers and product marketers to get granular visibility on product user behavior and improve retention rates or conversion rates to forecast product roadmap decisions. </span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Pricing:</strong> <a rel="noopener" href="https://mixpanel.com/pricing/" target="_blank">Free plan</a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> available. Paid plans start from US$25/month.</span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Who would find Mixpanel helpful:</strong> <span style="font-weight: 400;">Product marketers and product owners of SaaS products</span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><strong>Integrations:</strong> <span style="font-weight: 400;">Multiple integrations available in their </span><a rel="noopener" href="https://mixpanel.com/integrations/" target="_blank">integrations directory</a></p>
<p> </p>
